```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(mapboxapi)
```
## Get mound data
```{r}
Yam_mnds <- readRDS("../output_data/Yam_dd_mnds.rds") # 1073 features
hist(Yam_mnds$prom250mbuff)
Yam_mnds %>% 
  filter(prom250mbuff > 85) %>% 
  mapview()
```

## Walking isochrones
```{r}

mnds_85prom <- Yam_mnds %>% 
  filter(prom250mbuff > 85)

# Walking range
walking_isos <- mb_isochrone(mnds_85prom, 
  profile = "walking", 
  time = 60, 
  id = "TRAP")

mapview(walking_isos) + mapview(mnds_85prom)
saveRDS(walking_isos, "../output_data/walkisos85promnds.rds")
```
